response.overview: A Village called Rudravaram, which is on crisis. To develop that village the head of the village called sarpanch and Main priest of Rudraeshwara Temple were try in many ways, But Politicains and Offices don't make this happen. One fine day the priest were explain treasure that belongs to temple to the Sarpanch. This all secretly were heard by the priest son. From there story begins How these treasure will find by the priest son and their friends. Is there village got developed or not is the story you need to watch
response.title: Rudraksharam
